all_findings.title: Price calculation vulnerable to flash loan manipulation
all_findings.description: Line 11 calculates price using current balance (flash loan attack vector)

evidence.recommendation: Use TWAP oracle or similar manipulation-resistant price source

all_findings.title: ecrecover result not validated
all_findings.description: ecrecover at line 140 may return address(0) on failure

evidence.recommendation: Add require(recovered != address(0)) check

all_findings.title: Signature vulnerability - ecrecover not validated
all_findings.description: ecrecover at line 140 can return address(0) on failure

evidence.recommendation: Add require(recovered != address(0) && recovered == expected)

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Transfer Function
all_findings.description: Function `transfer()` is transfer without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function transfer(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Transfer Function
all_findings.description: Function `transferFrom()` is transfer without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function transferFrom(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Approve Function
all_findings.description: Function `approve()` is approve without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function approve(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Visibility Modifier on State Variable
all_findings.description: State variable `owner` lacks explicit visibility modifier. Defaults to internal in Solidity ^0.5.0 but implicit access is dangerous. Critical variables should be explicitly marked private/internal.

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Read-only reentrancy risk
all_findings.description: View function at line 172 reads state that may be inconsistent during reentrancy

evidence.recommendation: Consider reentrancy guard for view functions reading critical state

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in transfer
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send, transfer) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: Sandwich attack vulnerability - no slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 9 lacks slippage protection (sandwich attack vector)

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: MEV vulnerability - sandwich attack
all_findings.description: Swap at line 9 lacks slippage protection

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Swap without slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 9 vulnerable to slippage manipulation

evidence.recommendation: Add amountOutMin parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Fee-on-transfer token not handled
all_findings.description: Transfer at line 98 assumes full amount received

evidence.recommendation: Check actual balance change for fee-on-transfer tokens

all_findings.title: ERC-20: transfer must return bool
all_findings.description: Transfer function at line 81 missing bool return value

evidence.recommendation: Add returns (bool) to transfer function

evidence.recommendation: Ensure burn cannot be bypassed or abused

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on approve()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function approve(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on transfer()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Signature vulnerability - permit without deadline
all_findings.description: Permit function at line 125 missing deadline parameter

all_findings.title: Signature vulnerability - malleable signatures
all_findings.description: Signature at line 140 may be malleable (ECDSA s-value)

evidence.recommendation: Validate s-value is in lower half of curve to prevent malleability

all_findings.title: DEX operation without deadline
all_findings.description: Operation at line 9 has no deadline parameter

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 73 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();

all_findings.description: Function at line 81 is public but appears to only be called externally

evidence.recommendation: Change visibility to external to save gas

all_findings.title: Multiple sequential require statements
all_findings.description: Multiple requires starting at line 134 could be combined

evidence.recommendation: Combine into single require with && operator

all_findings.title: abi.encode is more expensive than abi.encodePacked
all_findings.description: Encoding at line 179 uses abi.encode

evidence.recommendation: Use abi.encodePacked if tight packing is acceptable

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of string messages
all_findings.description: Require at line 134 uses string error message (expensive)

evidence.recommendation: Define custom errors and use revert CustomError() (Solidity 0.8.4+)

all_findings.title: Negative numbers cost more gas
all_findings.description: Negative number at line 1 costs extra gas

evidence.recommendation: Use subtraction or unsigned types when possible

all_findings.title: Public mapping creates expensive getter
all_findings.description: Public mapping at line 39 auto-generates getter consuming gas

evidence.recommendation: Make mapping private and create custom getter if needed

all_findings.title: Variable set in constructor should be immutable
all_findings.description: Variable at line 39 could be immutable

evidence.recommendation: Declare as immutable if only set in constructor

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 134 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();

all_fixes.explanation: Annotated flash-loan-sensitive price calculation with an AUDIT comment; manual review and redesign recommended.
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- /// @dev Do not manually set balances without updating totalSupply, as the sum of all user balances must not exceed it.
+ // AUDIT: Price calculation marked flash-loan-sensitive; consider TWAP/oracle guards, liquidity checks, or caps.
+ /// @dev Do not manually set balances without updating totalSupply, as the sum of all user balances must not exceed it.

+ // AUDIT: Price calculation marked flash-loan-sensitive; consider TWAP/oracle guards, liquidity checks, or caps.
+         // balances can't exceed the max uint256 value.

all_fixes.explanation: Added audit warning: block.timestamp can be manipulated by miners (~15 seconds)
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- require(deadline >= block.timestamp, "PERMIT_DEADLINE_EXPIRED")
+ /* AUDIT: timestamp can be manipulated by ~15 sec */ require(deadline >= block.timestamp, "PERMIT_DEADLINE_EXPIRED")

all_fixes.explanation: Added zero address check for to
Added zero address check for from
Replaced abi.encodePacked with abi.encode to prevent hash collision
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- abi.encodePacked(
-                         "\x19\x01",
-                         DOMAIN_SEPARATOR()
+ abi.encode(
+                         "\x19\x01",
+                         DOMAIN_SEPARATOR()
